member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.Colors
member.summary: The number of colors to use. Only applicable for png, gif, and bmp photos where palletes can be used. The default is -1, which means "as much color fidelity as possible".

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.Dither
member.summary: Enables dithering for PNG8 and GIF

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.CreateIfSuitable(ImageResizer.ResizeSettings,System.Object)
member.summary: Returns an encoder instance if a Gif or 8-bit png is requested.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.Write(System.Drawing.Image,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Writes the indexed PNG or GIF file

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.GetBitsNeededForColorDepth(System.Byte)
member.summary: Returns how many bits are required to store the specified number of colors. Performs a Log2() on the value.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.IsValidOutputFormat(System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Returns true if the this encoder supports the specified image format

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.PreservePalette
member.summary: If true, the original palette will be used if it exists. May cause serious color problems if new content has been added to the image.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.OutputFormat
member.summary: If you set this to anything other than Gif or Png, it will throw an exception. Defaults to GIF.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.PrettyGifs.HasFullTrust
member.summary: Returns true if the assembly can call unmanged code (i.e, has full trust)

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer
member.summary: Quantize using an Octree

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer
member.summary: Abstract Quantizer class - handles the messy, algorithm-independent details of quantization. Subclasses must implement InitialQuantizePixel, GetPallete(), and QuantizePixel. Not thread-safe!

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Construct the quantizer
member.param: If true, the quantization only needs to loop through the source pixels once - InitialQuantiize
member.remarks: If you construct this class with a true value for singlePass, then the code will, when quantizing your image, only call the 'QuantizeImage' function. If two passes are required, the code will call 'InitialQuantizeImage' and then 'QuantizeImage'.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Reset
member.summary: Resets the quantizer so it can process a new image.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Quantize(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Quantize an image and return the resulting output bitmap
member.returns: A quantized version of the image

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.AnalyzeImage(System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Execute the first pass through the pixels in the image
member.param: The width in pixels of the image
The height in pixels of the image

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.QuantizeImage(System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData,System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Execute a second pass through the bitmap. If dithering is enabled, sourceData will be modified.
member.param: The source bitmap, locked into memory
The intermediate bitmap, used for 4-pass quantization. If specified, output will not actually be modified
The width in pixels of the image
The height in pixels of the image

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.AdjustNeighborSource(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Can only be called from QuantizePixel... This is how dithering is done... 5-18-09 ndj

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.InitialQuantizePixel(ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32)
member.summary: Override this to process the pixel in the first pass of the algorithm
member.remarks: This function need only be overridden if your quantize algorithm needs two passes, such as an Octree quantizer.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.QuantizePixel(ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32)
member.summary: Override this to process the pixel in the second pass of the algorithm

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.GetPalette(System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette)
member.summary: Retrieve the palette for the quantized image
member.param: Any old palette, this is overrwritten

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.FixedPalette
member.summary: (Readonly) If true, the algorithm can do everything in QuantizePixel, and InitialQuantizePixel will not be called. Implies ResizeForFirstPass=False and FourPass=false=

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.PixelSize
member.summary: The number of bytes in a ARGB structure. Should be 4

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.FullTrust
member.summary: If true, pointer arithmetic will be used instead of GetPixel. GetPixel is much slower. If false, OmitFinalStage will be assumed true, as only palette generation is possible in low trust. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.ResizeForFirstPass
member.summary: If true, the first pass (InitialQuantizePixel) will be performed on a size-limited version of the original image to control performance. Ignored if FixedPalette=True

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.FirstPassPixelCount
member.summary: The approximate number of pixels to use when making a scaled copy of the image for the first pass. Only used when ResizeForFirstPass=True and FirstPassPixelThreshold is exceeded.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.FirstPassPixelThreshold
member.summary: The maximum number of pixels the original image may contain before a scaled copy is made for the first pass. Only relevant when ResizeForFirstPass=True

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.FourPass
member.summary: If true, image is re-paletted after quantization - forces 2 clones of the original image to be created. FixedPalette and OmitFinalStage should be false if this is used.

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.OmitFinalStage
member.summary: If true, a 32-bit image with an 8-bit palette will be returned instead of an 8-bit image, which GDI can save using median-cut quantization. Much faster than our final quantization pass, although it can't do transparency. Assumed true if FullTrust is false.

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32
member.summary: Struct that defines a 32 bpp colour
member.remarks: This struct is used to read data from a 32 bits per pixel image in memory, and is ordered in this manner as this is the way that the data is layed out in memory

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32.Blue
member.summary: Holds the blue component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32.Green
member.summary: Holds the green component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32.Red
member.summary: Holds the red component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32.Alpha
member.summary: Holds the alpha component of the colour

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32.ARGB
member.summary: Permits the color32 to be treated as an int32

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32.Color
member.summary: Return the color for this Color32 object

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Construct the octree quantizer
member.remarks: The Octree quantizer is a two pass algorithm. The initial pass sets up the octree, the second pass quantizes a color based on the nodes in the tree
member.param: The maximum number of colors to return

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Reset
member.summary: Clears the octree

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Reset(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Clears the octree and reconfigures color settings

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.InitialQuantizePixel(ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32)
member.summary: Process the pixel in the first pass of the algorithm
member.remarks: This function need only be overridden if your quantize algorithm needs two passes, such as an Octree quantizer.

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.DitherMatrix
member.summary: a Floyd-Steinberg dither matrix new float[,] {{0,0,0}, {0,0,0.44f}, {0.19f,0.31f,0.06f}};

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.QuantizePixel(ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32)
member.summary: Override this to process the pixel in the second pass of the algorithm

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.GetPalette(System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorPalette)
member.summary: Retrieve the palette for the quantized image
member.param: Any old palette, this is overrwritten

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer._octree
member.summary: Stores the tree

member.name: F:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer._maxColors
member.summary: Maximum allowed color depth

member.name: P:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Dither
member.summary: Uses a Floyd-Steinberg dither

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Octree
member.summary: Class which does the actual quantization

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Octree.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Construct the octree
member.param: The maximum number of significant bits in the image

member.summary: Add a given color value to the octree

member.summary: Reduce the depth of the tree

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Octree.TrackPrevious(ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Octree.OctreeNode)
member.summary: Keep track of the previous node that was quantized

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Octree.Palletize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Convert the nodes in the octree to a palette with a maximum of colorCount colors
member.returns: An arraylist with the palettized colors

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.OctreeQuantizer.Octree.GetPaletteIndex(ImageResizer.Plugins.PrettyGifs.Quantizer.Color32)
member.summary: Get the palette index for the passed color

member.summary: Mask used when getting the appropriate pixels for a given node

member.summary: The root of the octree

member.summary: Number of leaves in the tree

member.summary: Array of reducible nodes

member.summary: Maximum number of significant bits in the image

member.summary: Store the last node quantized

member.summary: Cache the previous color quantized
